Package jMidiSequencerBeta.model

Interface IjVirtualInstrument

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JVirtualInstrument
    public interface IjVirtualInstrument
    The interface Represents a midi based musical instrument interface for a midi track.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getNoteRepresentation​(int pitch)  
      int getNumber()
      Returns its current instrument number.
      int getOctaveDegree()
      Return the size of an octave in this virtual instrument.
      java.lang.String getScale()
      Returns a string representing all the notes supported by the Virtual instrument.

    • Method Detail

      • getOctaveDegree

        int getOctaveDegree()
        Return the size of an octave in this virtual instrument.

      • getScale

        java.lang.String getScale()
        Returns a string representing all the notes supported by the Virtual instrument.

      • getNoteRepresentation

        java.lang.String getNoteRepresentation​(int pitch)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        pitch - returns a string representation of the appropriate note depending on the specified pitch.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if is a negative value.

      • getNumber

        int getNumber()
        Returns its current instrument number.
